review: I absolutely love the Amazon Fire Stick. Tons of streaming options and the picture is great quality and speed. I have been using this nonstop since Friday and it has not buffered once.Awesome product! I will be ordering another for my living room so I don't have to keep unplugging it and moving it around. I will say installation is easy and fast and it is not hard to disconnect and plug up to any tv in your home. I just prefer to have 2.Great job Amazon!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Seems fine. I had no idea the black circle was a button. Thought it was a microphone. Duh. Called and got immediate tech support. I signed up for the Amazon Prime trial. It looks like there is very little worthwhile programming that you don't have to pay additional $$ for. Probably won't continue with it.
author: Julie

review: Seriously, this is one of the best things that has happened to me as far as streaming video goes. I use to use the Xbox 360 solely for netflix, and since I didn't want to pay the Gold membership fee, I decided to grab one of these on prime day. So glad I did! The iPhone app that you can get for this works like a dream as well. Not to mention, you hardly had to lift a finger to find your Fire Stick and start taking control. Awesome piece of technology, very fast and easy to setup, I would highly recommend!
